@@
// MoasdaWiki Server configuration file
//
// Changes take effect only after a server restart.
// The characters "@@" on top and bottom of the file are
// just for better readability as wiki page.

// Port number of the wiki server. If no port is given,
// the default port 11080 is used.

port = 11080

// Message file with translations

messagefile = /wiki/messages.txt

// Wiki page used as start page

page.startpage = /Home

// Wiki page used as navigation panel

page.navigation = /wiki/Navigation

// Wiki page with HTML headers

page.html.header = /wiki/HtmlHeader

// Wiki page used as page header

page.header = /wiki/PageHeader

// Wiki page used as page footer

page.footer = /wiki/PageFooter

// Wiki page used as parent page of all content template pages.
// The child pages can be selected on the editor page.

page.templates = /wiki/Templates

// Wiki page name used as folder overview. If a repository folder
// contains a wiki page with this name, it is automatically used
// to generate the folder overview. Otherwise the default wiki page
// is used instead. A repository folder is addressed with a final '/'.
// To turn off this feature, just comment out both options.

page.index.name = Index
page.index.default = /wiki/IndexStandard

// Repository folder that contains files to be accessed via
// a root path URL, e.g. /favicon.ico

repository.root = root

// Restrict access to the same host as the wiki server?
// If set to "false", the wiki server can be accessed from any
// computer in the LAN (except there is a firewall).
// Is relevant for both, access by browser and synchronization
// with the App.

authentication.onlylocalhost = false
@@
